review: Extremely happy with the Doctor's treatment. I've consulted 3 Gynaecologist before this and yet my issue wasn't resolved. However Dr. Padma ma'am identified the issue and resolved it in the first visit itself. She is very knowledgeable, skilled and professional. Would recommend consulting her 100 percent for sure.

This was my 1st visit with Dr Padma, consulted for physical problems, closely looking at my health progress, doctor consultation was quite good, only problem was that waiting time was bit long about an hour, after this visited 4 times for follow up, during all 3 times waiting time was high, Hospital facilities are good. I was able decide on this doctor with the help of the reviews and the doctor's availability on practo which helps deciding.

** ***** ***** *** ** ** * ***** ******* *** ***** **** ***** *** ********* *** ** ***** *** ******* , my wife was suffering from severe pain n I was calling 100 time on that day but she didn't respond. Then another day I called her again once ,but she disconnected....
I specifically recommend  not to consult this doctor

We met doctor to show my wife reports , we were kept waiting for 1/5hr  ,she did not look at that report and also did not asked any question, she didn't gave as proper explanation of reports, she didn't even have time for consultation in 10 min she finished her explanation, i didn't have much good experience with the doctor.
She wont spend more than a minute at consultation and also she is not approchable over phone in case of any emergency.** ******** ******* ** **** ****** ******* ********* ** **** *****

She is well experienced *** ***** **  ***** ** ***** Her medical advise / treatment is appreciatable. 
Thankful forever to Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
